title: Fatal Fury: City of the Wolves

synonyms: Fatal Fury: CotW Special Music Video, Garou Densetsu: City of the Wolves
alternative_titles.ja: 餓狼伝説CotW｜スペシャルミュージックビデオ

synopsis:
The music video features "Terry Andy Joe," a Ganacci-crafted remix of popular Fatal Fury music, set to the stunning animation of Masami Oobari (who himself served as creative producer, director, storyboarder, and key animation director). The City of the Wolves comes to life, moving to the beat of EDM, in this amazing artistic endeavor!

(Souce: Youtube)
